action.msg: Huff. . . thanks for the beatdown. . . I really needed that.
By the way, you fight really well.
It's a dirty type of style, I sensed the feelings that you had for Tea in every note.
And even if you did beat me, I'm still way hotter than you'll ever be.
You're really lucky to have Fever by your side. I can only hope that I'll have someone that cares for me the same way he does.
I'll kill them and take their identity, just like I did with the last person I made the mistake of trusting.
Fineeee, I bid you adieu. Until next time, Fever. . .
Seriously. Is everyone on Earth an idiot?
I know, right? It's a good thing I'm not like that.
